Lakewood.Wyndham Hotel at Playhouse Square: The Wyndham Hotel at Playhouse Square is a high-end 182 feet, 14 story, high-rise Wyndham Hotel in downtown Cleveland's Theater District on Huron Road and Euclid Avenue. It is the only Wyndham Hotel in Ohio, the next closest Wyndham is in Pittsburgh. The facade features windows intersected by ribbons of lightly colored metal.
